summary: The diff implements all three requirements. REQ-1 is addressed in ApprovalDetailView.tsx with approval logic and role-based visibility. REQ-2 is addressed with ActivitiesList.tsx, ActivityFormPage.tsx, and activity integration in ReportFormPage.tsx and ReportsListPage.tsx. REQ-3 is addressed by fixing imports, hook names, and routing in App.tsx. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the available diff evidence.
